channel.title: Posts on The Pursuit of Software Craftsmanship
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Pursuit of Software Craftsmanship

item.title: Understanding System Load
item.description: This writeup tries to answer following questions How do you know, your application is being run at full potential? What are possible bottleneck in system, is it application or supporting services (logging, reporter etc)?

item.title: First Post
item.description: Honing one's craft is boring Hi, This blog is collection of my learning along the way while chasing the art of software development, I feel that software development is art, like a painting, and software devs are painter.
